howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Your tarot reading in four simple steps

step1.title: Choose your spread
step1.description: Select from 4 types of spreads based on the depth you seek.

step2.title: Focus your intention
step2.description: Formulate your question or situation with clarity and focus.

step3.title: Reveal the cards
step3.description: The cards are selected and revealed one by one for you.

step4.title: Receive your guidance
step4.description: Get a deep interpretation connecting the cards with your question.

spreadsSection.title: Spread Types
spreadsSection.subtitle: From quick consultations to deep analysis, we have the perfect spread for every question.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about tarot readings
faq.a1: A tarot reading is an ancient practice of self-knowledge where cards act as mirrors of your current situation, helping you reflect on your circumstances, emotions, and possible paths forward. It doesn't predict the future deterministically, but offers perspectives and guidance.
faq.a2: Our AI has been trained with deep knowledge of traditional tarot symbolism. It analyzes the specific combination of cards that appear in your reading, their positions and orientations, to offer you a coherent and personalized interpretation that connects with your original question.
faq.a3: Absolutely. Your readings are completely private and only you can access them. We don't share your information with third parties and you can delete your history at any time. Your spiritual journey is yours alone.

cta.title: Begin your spiritual journey
cta.subtitle: Sign up now and receive 3 free readings. Discover what the cards have in store for you.

dailyOracle.title: Your Daily Card, Every Morning
dailyOracle.description: Start each day with cosmic guidance. Get a personalized tarot card delivered to your inbox, interpreted specifically for your zodiac sign and life focus.

about.title: About Arcana
about.intro: Arcana is a modern tarot reading platform that combines ancient wisdom with artificial intelligence to provide personalized spiritual guidance.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We believe that tarot is a powerful tool for self-reflection and personal growth. Our mission is to make this ancient practice accessible to everyone, providing thoughtful interpretations that resonate with your unique situation.

how.title: How It Works
how.content: Our platform uses advanced AI to analyze the cards drawn in your reading and provide interpretations that connect with your specific question or intention. Each reading is unique and personalized to your situation.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Tarot readings are intended for entertainment and self-reflection purposes only. They should not be used as a substitute for professional advice in legal, financial, medical, or psychological matters.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Arcana, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: Arcana provides tarot readings powered by artificial intelligence for entertainment and self-reflection purposes. Our service is not intended to provide professional advice of any kind.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

credits.title: Credits and Payments
credits.content: Credits purchased on our platform are non-refundable. Credits do not expire but may be subject to terms updates. Free readings are provided as a promotional offer and may be modified or discontinued at any time.

conduct.title: User Conduct
conduct.content: You agree not to misuse our service, attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems, or use the service for any illegal purposes.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including your email address, name (optional), and the readings you perform. We also collect usage data to improve our service.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your information to provide and improve our service, process transactions, send you updates (if you opt-in), and respond to your inquiries.

storage.title: Data Storage
storage.content: Your readings are stored securely and are only accessible to you. We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties, except as necessary to provide our service (e.g., payment processing) or as required by law.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to maintain your session and remember your preferences. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect the functionality of our service.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also delete your reading history at any time from your account settings.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.
